title: Video Script
description: A structured representation of a video script, including scenes, visuals, and audio.

totalDurationEstimate.description: An estimated total duration of the video in seconds.

characters.description: A list of all characters in the script.

characterId.description: A unique identifier for the character.

scenes.description: The main body of the script, broken down into scenes.

sceneId.description: A unique identifier for the scene.

sceneNumber.description: The sequential number of the scene.

location.description: The physical location of the scene.

durationEstimate.description: The estimated duration of this scene in seconds.

visuals.description: A description of the on-screen action, camera movements, and settings.

audio.description: Dialogue, voice-overs, and sound effects for the scene.

characterId.description: The ID of the character speaking or associated with the audio.

dialogue.description: The spoken lines of the character.

soundEffects.description: Descriptions of sound effects or music.
